branchCategory.name: LVM20/200, 2/3 Port Solenoid Valve for Chemicals
branchCategory.description: <p>LVM20/200 is a compact direct operated 2/3 port solenoid valve for chemicals. LVM's unique internal chamber design reduces the swept volume to a minimum and can mean zero dead volume and carry over. &nbsp;Operating pressure ranges from -75 kPa to 0.30 MPa. LVM20/200 is available as body ported, direct tube connection or base mounted. Maximum flow up to Cv of 0.065</p>
